Class StudentMarkRecord

java.lang.Object
  StudentMarkRecord

public class StudentMarkRecord
extends java.lang.Object

Describes Student Mark records that have - a student name, - the number of assignments submitted so far - the average mark so far Making a new StudentMarkRecord requires the student's name. recordMark(double mark) will add a new assignment to the record, and update the average display() will print withdraw an amount from the balance of the account, as long as the current balance is big enough.

Constructor Summary
StudentMarkRecord(java.lang.String name)
          Construct a new StudentMarkRecord object; parameter is the name of the student.

 void display()
          print out the student's mark record
 void recordMark(double mark)
          record a mark for a new assignment
